blocks.name: Header
blocks.heading: Minimal Page Builder
blocks.subheading: A simple PHP and Bootstrap based CMS

blocks.name: Feature Block
blocks.text:
Simple PHP based CMS and Page Builder.
Data is simply stored in and retrieved from JSON files.
Uses PHP based templates to generate content blocks.

blocks.name: Missing Features
blocks.text:
User and login system has not yet been implemented.
UI lacks many QoL features, such as reordering pages and blocks.

blocks.name: Notice
blocks.snippet:
I would not recommend using this CMS for a real website, but it is a simple base that can be built on.
It can also serve as a sandbox to experiment with the implementations of tools, without worrying about the strict data structures of a database.

blocks.name: Link
blocks.text:
The login system is not currently implemented.
Please use this link.

blocks.name: Content Block
blocks.text: Defaults to the "/404" route if it cannot find the requested page.
